availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lilly Tilford Johnson (Kentucky resident. Married to Willa Viley Johnson)

body.p: Kentucky resident. Lexington, Kentucky native. Married to Willa Viley Johnson on October 22, 1860. Mother of Emily M. Johnson and George W. Johnson.

ab.bibl: Find A Grave, "Lilly Tilford Johnson (1842-1930)," Memorial #84679184, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84679184/lilly-johnson (accessed January 16, 2018). "The Viley Family," Register of the Kentucky Historical Society 7 (1909): 107-118. Pension application of Lillie Tilford Johnson, State of Texas, Pension File # 39765, Alabama, Texas and Virginia, Confederate Pensions, 1884-1958 (accessed at ancestry.com).
